name: adopt
label: Adopt the standard in a council

childNodes.label: Verified feed directory
childNodes.teaser: View and browse verified providers of API feeds.

childNodes.name: join
childNodes.label: Join our community
childNodes.teaser: Register to receive news and updates.

childNodes.name: overview
childNodes.label: Technical overview to implementing Open Referral UK
childNodes.teaser: Start here: A comprehensive introduction to ORUK for technical implementers aimed mainly at councils but relevant to most publishers and consumers of ORUK data.

childNodes.name: validator
childNodes.label: Check your compliance
childNodes.teaser: This tool checks that a specific data feed follows the standard. It shows any issues as well as statistics on what types of data is included in the scanned data feed. This helps Councils move to the standard. This tool also helps establish trust as it ensures that a Service Directory follows the standard.

childNodes.name: dashboard
childNodes.label: Verified feed availability
childNodes.teaser: This tool provides near-real time status reporting for core service providers.

childNodes.name: register
childNodes.label: Register your feed
childNodes.teaser: Add your feed to our directory.

childNodes.name: api
childNodes.label: Reference: API
childNodes.teaser: The API queries and responses required to comply with the ORUK API specification.

childNodes.name: schemata
childNodes.label: Reference: Data model
childNodes.teaser: Details of the entities and their fields/properties that make up the ORUK data specification.

childNodes.name: specifications
childNodes.label: Reference: The specification
childNodes.teaser: The data specification expressed in JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).

childNodes.teaser: The data specification expressed in JavaScript Object Notation (JSON).
